Package com.google.enterprise.connector.util

Defines utility classes that might be helpful for connector developers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChecksumGenerator
    Provide checksums over input.
    Clock
    Injectable clock to allow better testing.
    InputStreamFactory
    Interface for a factory for an InputStream to read a document.
    UniqueIdGenerator
    Interface for providers of a unique String ID.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Base16
    Base16 encoder class.
    Base64
    Base64 converter class.
    Base64ChecksumGenerator
    An implementation of ChecksumGenerator that return Base64-encoded checksums using algorithms from java.security.MessageDigest.
    Base64FilterInputStream
    A FilterInputStream that Base64 encodes data read from an input stream.
    BasicChecksumGenerator
    An implementation of ChecksumGenerator that return hexadecimal-encoded checksums using algorithms from java.security.MessageDigest.
    EmptyDocumentList
    An empty document list that provides a new checkpoint.
    EofFilterInputStream
    This Filter protects against the poorly behaved Apache Commons IO AutoCloseInputStream, which can close a stream out from underneath us.
    FileInputStreamFactory
    An InputStreamFactory that manufactures FileInputStreams.
    IOExceptionHelper Deprecated
    Use IOException.IOException(String, Throwable)
    MimeTypeDetector
    Detector for MIME type based on file name and content.
    SAXParseErrorHandler
    A simple ErrorHandler implementation to be used with the the SAX Parser.
    SslUtil
    Utility methods for SSL.
    SystemClock
    Clock implementation that returns System.currentTimeMillis().
    TraversalTimer
    A simple timer to control traversal loops and avoid batch timeouts.
    UrlInputStreamFactory
    An InputStreamFactory that manufactures URL InputStream.
    UrlValidator
    Validates URLs by making an HTTP request.
    UuidGenerator
    A UniqueIdGenerator implementation backed by UUID.
    XmlParseUtil
    Utility functions for parsing XML.
    XmlParseUtil.LocalEntityResolver
    An EntityResolver implementation that resolves entities using a selection of locally stored DTDs.
    XmlParseUtil.ThrowingErrorHandler
    A simple ErrorHandler implementation that always throws the SAXParseException.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Base64DecoderException
    Exception thrown when encountering an invalid Base64 input character.
    UrlValidatorException
    Represents an invalid HTTP response during URL validation.

Package com.google.enterprise.connector.util Description

Defines utility classes that might be helpful for connector developers.

This package consists of concrete classes. Connector developers are not required to use the classes in this package. They are provided in case they are useful. In some cases, the connector manager may also use these classes.
